title: Kled
body:
Are you guys really out of ideas you had to go ahead and create a baby Rengar and name him "Kled".
There are so many more ideas out there.

Disappointed Rito, Disappointed.

replies.body:
If you think about it, Kled could have looked like absolutely anything and his kit would still bring something fresh to the table. Even though it comes to personal taste aesthetically, I'm convinced the gameplay and VO will tie everything together when we get our hands on him.

Also, this isn't even close to Baby Mario who is _actually_ Mario as a baby (not to mention Luigi, Peach and whoever else has received the same treatment over the years).
Kled is the most broken champion.His life is so annoying that when i see him I ragequit.I cant counter him with any vhampion I try so please do something
This is two years old. Don’t necro
Kled is the most unique champ to come out since the release of azir

A) wrong eye
B) no cover, it's just a white ball
C) he rides a dino-chicken
D) he is crazy

my favourite part is 2 %HP damage abilities, an Ammo system, and a 4-hit ability.

All of Riots favourite things put together.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Xk28WIh7,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-26T04:01:09.094+0000)
>
> my favourite part is 2 %HP damage abilities, an Ammo system, and a 4-hit ability.
> 
> All of Riots favourite things put together.

jhin is the 4 hit, rest all been 3 hit
Baby Rengar? Wow everything they make someone will complain.
Kled looks like gnar and rengar had a baby.

Actually Kled is a "Unique" champ with alot of ingame mechanics, sorry you see him as a Rengar, i see a similar ability, but i also see a fun unique champ that can be as equally frustrating and fun to play win or lose. Which is what the most important thing is.

You do realize when they create a brand new "mechanic" it takes loads of testing to make sure it doesn't bug, loads of maths to see how it scales with other champs abillities etc, how much to scale its abilities with AD/AP items etc. Frankly having a cowardly mount which can break your champ in fun ways... Is a brilliant idea...

Sorry its not a new assassin or mage like Yasuo, or a rework on old classics like Brand/Malz to make them more OP than before. 

No easy champ for you to buy to feel good about i'm afraid. 

Gotta learn the mechanics like everyone else...

EG... Bard... GREAT GAME PLAY CHAMP, few people can use that gameplay well

insert Kled in the group of champs like Bard/Tham etc
